name: crafting_combinator_xeraph
title: Crafting Combinator Xeraph's Fork
author: LuziferSenpai, TheRustyKnife, Xeraph
description:
Fork of Crafting Combinator mod by TheRustyKnife.

Original mod description:
Includes combinators that allow you to set or read the recipe of any crafting machine, get ingredients or products of a recipe and more!
